item.title: Looking for a podcast video editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor who is experienced with editing full podcast episodes that contain audio and video, as well as making clips.

Must be fluent in English and provide examples of your work working with podcasts.

One of our podcasts deals with mature subject matter and may contain 18+ language.

Hourly Range: $35.00-$75.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 02:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
